content:
I am getting double slash on all my URLs and can not work out where it is coming from any hints? e.g. https://build.fhir.org/ig/hl7au/au-fhir-base//index.html
Other AU IGs look ok
are you using a liquid '{{}}' paramater or something like that? sometime the parameter ends with a slash and sometimes not. so {{}}/foo could cause that...
